name: Providence (Bryant Baumgartner)
description:
Survive hordes of enemies and waves of bullets in this 2.5D classic arcade style hack-and-shoot(?) bullet-hell.

Don the mechanical suit of a Providence soldier and slice your way through a campaign of enemies to discover the secret of your mysterious enemies and the organization you work for.

NEXT VERSION: (More) Voice Acting, new chapter(s), new ability.

Class project for collegiate course (and afterwards). Still in development.
